title: Textile, ca. 1925
medium:
Medium: rayon (?) silk
Technique: jacquard woven.  4 & 1 satin with alternating wefts making long floats as pattern requires.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 64 x 65 cm (25 3/16 x 25 9/16 in.)
description: Underwater plants.  Woven at top "Importation Exclusive."
